title: quarkus.banner.path not working
body:
### Describe the bug

Hi guys,

I've read [the document ](https://quarkus.io/guides/getting-started#banner) and here is my banner:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22415582/228731603-7ac70fb4-2f20-4c74-9333-8c9cbb72fb35.png)

and here is my application.properties

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22415582/228731681-0b340a9c-3a1c-44ab-85da-af99d97c1357.png)

and here is my log. Banner was not loaded

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22415582/228731781-8db232f8-5eb0-4ccc-8291-77e6a3ad6ce5.png)

As in spring, I only just add a file named banner.txt in src/main/resources, it'll displayed.

Please help me to fix this. I want to have different banner in each of my project.

Thanks and have a nice day guys!



### Expected behavior

Display my custom banner

### Actual behavior

When I put `quarkus.banner.path=default_banner11.txt` in application.properties, there isn't any banner displayed

### How to Reproduce?

1. Add a file .txt in src/main/resources
2. Add two config in application.properties
`quarkus.banner.enabled=true`
`quarkus.banner.path=default_banner11.txt`
3. Run project
